title: National Technology Day 2022: A look at 5 pieces of tech we can`t do without - WION
content: National Technology Day 2022: A look at 5 pieces of tech we can`t do without  WION
description: National Technology Day 2022: Every year on May 11th, National Technology Day honours the accomplishments of Indias scientific community, including scientists, researchers, and engineers.The day has historical significance because of the string of technological advances that the country made on that day decades before.
